resources.string: Quick tap to press mouse button
Hold one finger, and quick tap second to run right mouse click

To control the mouse cursor using your phone as a touchpad, simply slide your finger across the screen. The cursor will follow the direction and speed of your finger movements. It\'s intuitive and works just like a traditional touchpad! For more precise control, you can adjust the sensitivity settings in the app. Enjoy seamless navigation!

"To scroll within an active window, use two fingers and slide them vertically (up or down) on the screen. This gesture mimics the scrolling action of a traditional touchpad, allowing you to smoothly navigate through content like web pages, documents, or lists. "

To perform a right-click action, simply hold one finger on the screen (like a long press) and then quickly tap the screen with a second finger. This gesture simulates the right-click function of a mouse, allowing you to access context menus and additional options.
"It's a basic gesture, to perform click action quilcy tap screen. "
